Package at.htlkaindorf.entities.enemies

Class Walker

java.lang.Object
com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.TextureRegion
com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Sprite
at.htlkaindorf.entities.enemies.Enemy
at.htlkaindorf.entities.enemies.Walker
public class Walker
extends Enemy
The walker class is used to create walking enemies in a level. It extends the enemy class.

  • Field Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • Walker

      public Walker​(PlayScreen screen, float x, float y, com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Animation walk, com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Animation die)
      Sets the bounds of the walker.
      Parameters:
      screen - playscreen on which the walker should appear
      x - x position of the coin
      y - y position of the coin
      walk - frames of the walking animation
      die - frames of the die animation
      Since:
      1.0

  • Method Details

    • update

      public void update​(float dt)
      The update method of the walker is called every frame. It does collision detection and animates the walker.
      Specified by:
      update in class Enemy
      Parameters:
      dt - delta time
      Since:
      1.0

    • setAnimationFrame

      public void setAnimationFrame()
      Sets the right frame of the walking animation. It also flips the frame if the walking direction changes.
      Since:
      1.0

    • destroy

      public void destroy()
      Called if the walker is dead.
      Since:
      1.0

    • defineEnemy

      protected void defineEnemy()
      Defines the Walker: Sets position for the frames and the type of the body. Creates the hitbox and the head area of the walker.
      Specified by:
      defineEnemy in class Enemy
      Since:
      1.0

    • draw

      public void draw​(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Batch batch)
      Draws the walker if it is not destroyed.

    • hitOnHead

      public void hitOnHead​(Player player)
      Called if the player hits the head of the walker. Turns setToDestroy true.
      Specified by:
      hitOnHead in class Enemy
      Parameters:
      player - the player which hit the enemy
      Since:
      1.0

    • hitByEnemy

      public void hitByEnemy​(Enemy enemy)
      Called if the walker hits another enemy. It calles the reverseVelocity function.
      Specified by:
      hitByEnemy in class Enemy
      Parameters:
      enemy - the enemy which collided with the walker
      Since:
      1.0
